name: Listboost
tagline: An Android library that implements sliding list item menus, swipe to reveal menus, and other list tools and functionality for both ListView and ExpandableListView
body:
ListBoost
=========

An Android library that will implement these major features:

###ListView and ExpandableListView###
   * Sliding list item menus
   * Swipe-to-reveal menus
   * Drag to reorder  
   * MultiSelect mode


###ChangeLog###
####ListBoost v0.1 (Current)####
  * ListView sliding list item menus is working for both cursor and non-cursor adapters. 
      _fixme: saveInstanceState isn't functioning_
  * ExpandableList multiSelect mode is mostly scaffolded out.
  * Demo app is functional with sliding menu functionality for BoostListView implemented.


******************
###Special Thanks###

####ListView sliding list item menus implementation:####
https://github.com/tjerkw/Android-SlideExpandableListView
Tjerk Wolterink (@tjerkw)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
